00066 /* ********* general editor util funcs, not BKE stuff please! ********* */
00067 
00068 void ED_editors_init(bContext *C)
00069 {
00070     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00071     Scene *sce = CTX_data_scene(C);
00072     Object *ob, *obact = (sce && sce->basact) ? sce->basact->object : NULL;
00073     ID *data;
00074 
00075     /* toggle on modes for objects that were saved with these enabled. for
00076      * e.g. linked objects we have to ensure that they are actually the
00077      * active object in this scene. */
00078     for (ob = bmain->object.first; ob; ob = ob->id.next) {
00079         int mode = ob->mode;
00080 
00081         if (mode && (mode != OB_MODE_POSE)) {
00082             ob->mode = 0;
00083             data = ob->data;
00084 
00085             if (ob == obact && !ob->id.lib && !(data && data->lib))
00086                 ED_object_toggle_modes(C, mode);
00087         }
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091 /* frees all editmode stuff */
00092 void ED_editors_exit(bContext *C)
00093 {
00094     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00095     Scene *sce;
00096 
00097     if (!bmain)
00098         return;
00099     
00100     /* frees all editmode undos */
00101     undo_editmode_clear();
00102     ED_undo_paint_free();
00103     
00104     for (sce = bmain->scene.first; sce; sce = sce->id.next) {
00105         if (sce->obedit) {
00106             Object *ob = sce->obedit;
00107         
00108             if (ob) {
00109                 if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
00110                     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00111                     if (me->edit_btmesh) {
00112                         EDBM_mesh_free(me->edit_btmesh);
00113                         MEM_freeN(me->edit_btmesh);
00114                         me->edit_btmesh = NULL;
00115                     }
00116                 }
00117                 else if (ob->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00118                     ED_armature_edit_free(ob);
00119                 }
00120             }
00121         }
00122     }
00123 
00124     /* global in meshtools... */
00125     mesh_octree_table(NULL, NULL, NULL, 'e');
00126     mesh_mirrtopo_table(NULL, 'e');
00127 }

00133 /* now only used in 2d spaces, like time, ipo, nla, sima... */
00134 /* XXX shift/ctrl not configurable */
00135 void apply_keyb_grid(int shift, int ctrl, float *val, float fac1, float fac2, float fac3, int invert)
00136 {
00137     /* fac1 is for 'nothing', fac2 for CTRL, fac3 for SHIFT */
00138     if (invert)
00139         ctrl = !ctrl;
00140     
00141     if (ctrl && shift) {
00142         if (fac3 != 0.0f) *val = fac3 * floorf(*val / fac3 + 0.5f);
00143     }
00144     else if (ctrl) {
00145         if (fac2 != 0.0f) *val = fac2 * floorf(*val / fac2 + 0.5f);
00146     }
00147     else {
00148         if (fac1 != 0.0f) *val = fac1 * floorf(*val / fac1 + 0.5f);
00149     }
00150 }

00159     return rt + 15;

00163 void unpack_menu(bContext *C, const char *opname, const char *id_name, const char *abs_name, const char *folder, struct PackedFile *pf)
00164 {
00165     PointerRNA props_ptr;
00166     uiPopupMenu *pup;
00167     uiLayout *layout;
00168     char line[FILE_MAX + 100];
00169     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(opname, 1);
00170 
00171     pup = uiPupMenuBegin(C, "Unpack file", ICON_NONE);
00172     layout = uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
00173 
00174     strcpy(line, "Remove Pack");
00175     props_ptr = uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, line, ICON_NONE, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
00176     RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "method", PF_REMOVE);
00177     RNA_string_set(&props_ptr, "id", id_name);
00178 
00179     if (G.relbase_valid) {
00180         char local_name[FILE_MAXDIR + FILE_MAX], fi[FILE_MAX];
00181 
00182         BLI_strncpy(local_name, abs_name, sizeof(local_name));
00183         BLI_splitdirstring(local_name, fi);
00184         BLI_snprintf(local_name, sizeof(local_name), "//%s/%s", folder, fi);
00185         if (strcmp(abs_name, local_name) != 0) {
00186             switch (checkPackedFile(local_name, pf)) {
00187                 case PF_NOFILE:
00188                     BLI_snprintf(line, sizeof(line), "Create %s", local_name);
00189                     props_ptr = uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, line, ICON_NONE, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
00190                     RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "method", PF_WRITE_LOCAL);
00191                     RNA_string_set(&props_ptr, "id", id_name);
00192 
00193                     break;
00194                 case PF_EQUAL:
00195                     BLI_snprintf(line, sizeof(line), "Use %s (identical)", local_name);
00196                     //uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, ot, line, 0, "method", PF_USE_LOCAL);
00197                     props_ptr = uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, line, ICON_NONE, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
00198                     RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "method", PF_USE_LOCAL);
00199                     RNA_string_set(&props_ptr, "id", id_name);
00200 
00201                     break;
00202                 case PF_DIFFERS:
00203                     BLI_snprintf(line, sizeof(line), "Use %s (differs)", local_name);
00204                     //uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, ot, line, 0, "method", PF_USE_LOCAL);
00205                     props_ptr = uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, line, ICON_NONE, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
00206                     RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "method", PF_USE_LOCAL);
00207                     RNA_string_set(&props_ptr, "id", id_name);
00208 
00209                     BLI_snprintf(line, sizeof(line), "Overwrite %s", local_name);
00210                     //uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, ot, line, 0, "method", PF_WRITE_LOCAL);
00211                     props_ptr = uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, line, ICON_NONE, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
00212                     RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "method", PF_WRITE_LOCAL);
00213                     RNA_string_set(&props_ptr, "id", id_name);
00214                     break;
00215             }
00216         }
00217     }
00218 
00219     switch (checkPackedFile(abs_name, pf)) {
00220         case PF_NOFILE:
00221             BLI_snprintf(line, sizeof(line), "Create %s", abs_name);
00222             //uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, ot, line, 0, "method", PF_WRITE_ORIGINAL);
00223             props_ptr = uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, line, ICON_NONE, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
00224             RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "method", PF_WRITE_ORIGINAL);
00225             RNA_string_set(&props_ptr, "id", id_name);
00226             break;
00227         case PF_EQUAL:
00228             BLI_snprintf(line, sizeof(line), "Use %s (identical)", abs_name);
00229             //uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, ot, line, 0, "method", PF_USE_ORIGINAL);
00230             props_ptr = uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, line, ICON_NONE, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
00231             RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "method", PF_USE_ORIGINAL);
00232             RNA_string_set(&props_ptr, "id", id_name);
00233             break;
00234         case PF_DIFFERS:
00235             BLI_snprintf(line, sizeof(line), "Use %s (differs)", abs_name);
00236             //uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, ot, line, 0, "method", PF_USE_ORIGINAL);
00237             props_ptr = uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, line, ICON_NONE, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
00238             RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "method", PF_USE_ORIGINAL);
00239             RNA_string_set(&props_ptr, "id", id_name);
00240 
00241             BLI_snprintf(line, sizeof(line), "Overwrite %s", abs_name);
00242             //uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, ot, line, 0, "method", PF_WRITE_ORIGINAL);
00243             props_ptr = uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, line, ICON_NONE, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
00244             RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "method", PF_WRITE_ORIGINAL);
00245             RNA_string_set(&props_ptr, "id", id_name);
00246             break;
00247     }
00248 
00249     uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
00250 }
